data.author: Victor Kan

changelog.release_notes:
Super 2 Tone v2, with smaller fonts overall, and also all-CAPS month display now (I personally feel it gives better reading, but it's up to personal preferences)
Still gives you all the important stuffs like disconnected BT alerts, battery life, and this watch face is friendly to battery life!
